name: Coindice for bitcoin or altcoins
body:
### Welcome to Coin Dice 3.5. This is CoinDice 3.5 and is the original version that has been copied and sold for profit many times. Hence, the script is now available free and open source to anyone that wishes to make use of it. It can be used with bitcoin or altcoins. ### Instructions There are instructions enclosed in a PDF file which entail using Vestas. If you are comfortable with this kind of script, you can bypass Vestas. ### How to Install (the Vestas way):

1) Copy the contents of the /www folder into the root directory of your webserver.

2) Point your browser to /install folder (example.com/install/).

3) Follow the instructions at each installation step.

4) Enjoy your earnings!

### Recommended to install Ubuntu 14.04 64 bit with a Lamp Server. ### Improvements to the graphics The graphics are really very ugly and it would be interesting to see someone alter them to something more attractive. ### Have fun
